PropertyDef.Name: ChamberLengthOrRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: Length or, in the event of the shape being circular in plan, the radius of the chamber.

PropertyDef.Name: ChamberWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Width, in the event of the shape being non circular in plan.

PropertyDef.Name: WallMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the wall of the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed of a single material.

PropertyDef.Name: WallThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the wall construction. NOTE: It is assumed that walls will be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the base of the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber base will be constructed of a single material.

PropertyDef.Name: BaseThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the base construction, assumed to be constructed at a single thickness.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the access cover to the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed of a single material.
